Text:
Thanks for re-upping this zyklon..mostly I just want to preserve the existence of this software on the net, which you're being a big help in doing, and I'm glad I could help you find v5.3 to add to this collection.

I'll keep seeding this torrent too, then.

Thanks to you too js3, and yeah my point is to share a clean version of all DarkComet versions, and thanks for seeding too.
About your torrent you should zip the folder, as my antivirus is deleting the .exe file, and I can't seed it.
Till now I seeded at ratio 1:16, or 1.4GB, and I'll keep seeding.
Thanks to all seeders out there !

hey man! thanks.

It would be great if you could upload the removal tools also :)
